title: What is the difference between Ariana Grande from 2010 and 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: this will be separated into categories: visuals, dance, music/sound, image, timeline VISUALS 2010 usually red hairvery paleher makeup is very differentlots of dressesNickelodeon  2019 brown hairsignature ponytail due to damaged hair from 2010wears very big sweatshirts as dressesa lot tanner  DANCE 2011 - put your hearts up  MUSIC/SOUND 2011 that's when her first song came out (put your hearts up) 2019 (7 rings) IMAGE 2010 because Ariana was 17 years old, and on Nickelodeon, she had a very innocent image 2019 now that she is older (26 years old) and no longer controlled by Nickelodeon, she has a much more mature, sexy image TIMELINE 1993–2019 1993 - Ariana is born 2008 - plays in Broadway musical 2010 - plays Cat Valentine in the Nickelodeon show Victorious 2011 - releases first single 2017 - Manchester bombing 2018 - splits from Mac Miller, starts relationship and gets engaged to Pete Davidson, Mac Miller passes away, breaks engagement with Pete Davidson 2019 - shares brain scans of her PTSD

Ariana Grande from 2010 had just started out in the Nickelodeon show Victorious. At this point she wasn’t a household name. If she was lucky, she would’ve been recognized as that red-headed chick from Victorious.  Ariana Grande in 2010 In 2018, she’s an incredibly successful singer and songwriter who has recently achieved her first no. 1 single (and her 11th top 10 hit) in the Billboard Hot 100 with her new single titled thank u, next. Her most recent album, Sweetener, has gone on to be praised by many critics, and there has even been some talk about Sweetener being potentially considered a candidate for the “Album of the Year” category in the 2019 Grammy Awards.  Ariana receiving her VMA award in the 2018 VMAs.
